title: News for Sasquatch at the USDF

items.title: Restored Summit EFD data
items.content_text: While network connection between Summit and USDF is being sorted out, we are doing incremental restores of the Summit EFD at USDF manually. Currently the USDF EFD is synced with the Summit EFD up to 2022/09/30 22:00:00 UTC.

items.title: Restored Summit EFD data
items.content_text: While network connection between Summit and USDF is being sorted out, we are doing incremental restores of the Summit EFD at USDF manually. Currently the USDF EFD is synced with the Summit EFD up to 2022/09/16 18:00:00 UTC.

items.title: Restored Summit EFD data
items.content_text: While network connection between Summit and USDF is being sorted out, we are doing incremental restores of the Summit EFD at USDF manually. Currently the USDF EFD is synced with the Summit EFD up to 2022/08/21 00:00:00 UTC.

items.title: Sasquatch is available at USDF
items.content_text: Sasquatch is a service of the RSP for recording, displaying and alerting on Rubinâ€™s engineering data. On August 11, we have restored a full backup of the Summit database. Note that the replication service from the Summit to USDF is still being set up, which means that recent Summit data is not instantly available here yet.
